mapper.select: select * from member where member_id = #{member_id} and member_pw = #{member_pw}
select wishList_no, a.wishList_date, b.product_no, b.product_name from wishlist a, product b where a.member_no = #{mem_no} and a.product_no = b.product_no order by a.wishList_date desc
select * from shop_product t1 inner join shop t2 ON t1.shop_no = t2.shop_no inner join product t3 ON t3.product_no = t1.product_no where t3.product_no = #{product_no}
select a.shop_no, a.product_no, b.shop_gps_longitude, b.shop_gps_latitude from shop_product a inner join shop b on a.shop_no = b.shop_no
mapper.delete: delete from wishlist where wishList_no = #{wish_no} and member_no = #{mem_no}
mapper.select: select t1.product_no, t3.product_name from shop_product t1 inner join shop t2 on t1.shop_no = t2.shop_no inner join product t3 on t1.product_no = t3.product_no where member_no = #{member_no}
select wishlist_no from wishlist where member_no = #{member_no} and product_no = #{product_no}
mapper.update: update wishlist set wishList_date = now() where wishlist_no = #{wishlist_no}
mapper.select: select count(*) from shop_product where #{product_name} IN (select product.product_name from shop_product, product where product.product_no = shop_product.product_no AND shop_product.shop_no = (select shop.shop_no from shop where shop.member_no IN (select member_no from member where member_id='seller') ) )
select count(*) from wishlist, shop_product where wishlist.product_no = shop_product.product_no AND wishlist.product_no IN (select product_no from product where product_name = #{product_name})

select b.shop_no, b.member_no, b.shop_gps_longitude, b.shop_gps_latitude, a.soldout_check, a.product_no, c.product_name from shop_product a inner join product c on a.product_no = c.product_no right outer join shop b on a.product_no = #{prod_no} and a.shop_no = b.shop_no
